title: Episode #28 - Silence Of The Yams
description:
On today’s Episode of Million Dollaz Worth of Game, Gillie & Wallo discuss Transmitted Energy Diseases that cause mood swings in women. Also, Gillie tells the story of King Plucker & The Titty Sucker.

Semen Demons (7:38)
Burn Victims (12:18)
Not My Kid (18:10)
Million Dollaz Worth Of Game (24:13)
Jail Don’t Make You Real (33:28)
Who Would You Be? “Pick Your Torture” (39:39)
Stories From The Cell: Men Cry In The Dark (47:16)
Top 5 Rap Groups of All Time (100:18)

Song of The Week: Jay Copes “Remember”

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

The Million Dollaz Worth of Game show, a weekly podcast with rapper Gillie Da King and social media influencer and disruptor Wallo267 (who are also first-cousins) targeting their combined social media presence of over 1.3 million followers.


Gillie and Wallo’s audiences have been demanding a podcast and this is the delivery.  For their audience, the Million Dollaz Worth of Game show bridges the gap between social media and reality tv, satiating the hunger for original and authentic content.
